title: How Do I Address My Financial Trauma?
description:
For today’s Loose Change presented by Public.com, Berna is back with Shani Tran to continue their conversation on financial feels from earlier this week. They break down the physical manifestations money-related anxiety can have on your body, and offer some practical techniques for addressing the effects of your own financial trauma. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to stay up to date with the podcast and submit your questions!
Thanks again to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
